edu.illinois.mitra.starl.motion

Class MotionAutomaton_Ground

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.motion.RobotMotion
        • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.motion.MotionAutomaton_Ground
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptsKeyInput, Cancellable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RealMotionAutomaton_Ground, SimMotionAutomaton_Ground

    public abstract class MotionAutomaton_Ground
extends RobotMotion
    Base logic for all ground motion, allowing apps to use a goTo method to reach a specific point. Extended by SimMotionAutomaton_Ground for simulation and RealMotionAutomaton_Ground for real life applications.
